    <descript>
      <abstract>The dataset represents the location of Military Facilities in Washington, DC 2005</abstract>
      <purpose>This data is used for the planning and management of Washington, D.C. by local government agencies.</purpose>
    </descript>

      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied from the cd obtained from the CD obtained from Washington, DC 2005

Staff researched the location and extent of military facilities from web resources and the ADC Map Book.  Using the 2003 orthophoto, snapbase, planimetrics, and exisiting military layers, staff digitized the boundaries of the military facilities.  They do not follow the snapbase.  Instead, they follow the fence line, water line, and other ground identifiable features.  Pictometry was used in certain locations to determine ground features for capture as part of the boundary.

Staff then joined the existing military facility point layer with the polygon layer to transfer attribute information.  Then, staff verified the attributes and checked the data against existing sources.</procdesc>
        <procdate>2005</procdate>
